scrabble

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrabble.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassicScrabble, DoubleScrabble, MinimumScrabble, SuperScrabble, TonicaScrabble

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a game of scrabble. This abstract class is meant to be extended in order to create variations of scrabble games.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    George Piskas

        public static final java.lang.String[] ALL_LOCALES

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int boardSize,
    int rackSize,
    java.util.Locale locale,
    java.lang.String dstBdlPath,
    java.lang.String ptsBdlPath,
    java.lang.String albBdlPath)
        The constructor of a scrabble Game.
        Parameters:
        boardSize - the size of the board
        rackSize - the size of a player's rack. If 0, then letters are distributed evenly to all players till bag empty
        locale - the language selection
        dstBdlPath - path for the AlphabetDistribution bundle
        ptsBdlPath - path for the AlphabetPoints bundle
        albBdlPath - path for the Alphabet bundle

      • wordApprovalPopup

        public static int wordApprovalPopup()
        Generates a popup that asks the user if he approves the word the previous player played on the board.
        Returns:
        0 if the word is approved, 1 if not.
